# f5xc_securemesh_site (Data Source)

Shape of the Secure Mesh site specification

~> **Note** For more information about this data source, please refer to the [F5 XC API Documentation](https://docs.cloud.f5.com/docs/api/).

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "f5xc_securemesh_site" "example" {
  name      = "my-resource"
  namespace = "system"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the SecuremeshSite.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the SecuremeshSite exists.

### Read-Only

- `annotations` (Map of String) Annotations applied to this resource.
- `description` (String) Description of the SecuremeshSite.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the resource.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels applied to this resource.
